description: 学习现在完成时的持续用法：表示从过去开始持续到现在的动作或状态

explanation.basic_structure: 主语 + have/has + been + 动词-ing + ...
basic_rules: 现在完成时持续用法表示从过去开始持续到现在的动作或状态
常与for + 时间段，since + 时间点连用
强调动作的持续性和未完成性
usage_cases: 表示从过去持续到现在的动作：She has been living here for ten years. (她在这里住了十年，现在还住着)
表示从过去持续到现在的状态：I have been studying English since primary school. (我从小学开始学英语，现在还在学)
表示最近一直在进行的动作：He has been working on this project recently. (他最近一直在做这个项目)
time_expressions: for + 时间段：for ten years, for three months, for a long time
since + 时间点：since 2010, since last year, since childhood
recently, lately, these days, all day
common_errors: She has lived here since ten years. (错误) → She has lived here for ten years. (正确)
I have been study English for five years. (错误) → I have been studying English for five years. (正确)
He has been work here since 2020. (错误) → He has been working here since 2020. (正确)
usage_tips: for + 时间段，since + 时间点
现在完成时持续用法强调动作的持续性

with_for: I have been studying English for five years.
She has been living here for ten years.
He has been working on this project for three months.
We have been waiting for you for two hours.
They have been playing football for an hour.
with_since: I have been studying English since primary school.
She has been living here since 2010.
He has been working here since last year.
We have been waiting since 9 o'clock.
They have been playing since this morning.
sentences: I have been studying English for five years.
She has been living here for ten years.
He has been working on this project for three months.
We have been waiting for you for two hours.
They have been playing football for an hour.
